parameters.Description: The partner organization that should own the store; if left empty it selects the default partner

parameters.Name: minMarkup
parameters.Description: The minimum markup (in points) to put on all assets in this store

parameters.Name: maxMarkup
parameters.Description: The maximum markup (in points) to put on any given asset in this store; a value of zero means no maximum

parameters.Name: flatMarkup
parameters.Description: If true, then markup is interpreted as a flat point rate, otherwise as a percentage. See the markup parameter below for more details

parameters.Name: markup
parameters.Description: The markup to apply to assets in the store; if flatMarkup is true, then this is a number of points to add to each asset otherwise it is interpreted as a percentage to mark up the base price of assets by (e.g. 15 = 15%, so an asset with a base price of 100 points would cost 115 points in the store)

parameters.Name: flatMarkup
parameters.Description: If true, then markup is interpreted as a flat point rate, otherwise as a percentage. See the markup parameter below for more details. If not provided the value of flatMarkup is not changed

parameters.Name: markup
parameters.Description: The markup to apply to assets in the store; if flatMarkup is true, then this is a number of points to add to each asset otherwise it is interpreted as a percentage to mark up the base price of assets by (e.g. 15 = 15%, so an asset with a base price of 100 points would cost 115 points in the store); if not provided the rate is unchanged
